title: Interview with Professor Fergus McNeill
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Fergus McNeil who is a Professor of Criminology and Social Work at the University of Glasgow. Fergus discusses many of his ideas from his book: Pervasive Punishment: Making Sense of Mass Supervision.
